title: How To Position Your Portfolio To Ride Out Volatile Markets
description: Join Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Stephanie Link, chief investment strategist and portfolio manager at Hightower Advisors, to discuss the quality and value stocks she favors now and why a barbell portfolio may be the best way to ride out volatility.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
